New Help Doc

Joe Smarty

2016-10-24

To add two numbers use R like this example:

ans <- 2 + 7
ans
## [1] 9

The answer for adding 2 and 7 is 9.

Now Jeff likes to make pictures such as this histogram:

set.seed(123)
x <- rchisq(10000, 2)
hist(x, col = "purple")

Built by pkgdown. Styled with Bootstrap 3.
